entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
